title: Adele Returns! + RHOSLC/RHOP Recaps & Meredith Marks!
itunes:title: Adele Returns! + RHOSLC/RHOP Recaps & Meredith Marks!

description:
Adele is back with a gorgeous new song! Plus, Danny recaps this week's The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City and The Real Housewives of Potomac. After the recaps, he's joined by Meredith Marks from The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City. She discusses the Brooks/Jen sit down, what she was thinking when Mary pooted, the feds, and more!


RHOSLC Recap

RHOP Recap: 21:15ish

Meredith Marks Interview: 39:22ish


PREORDER DANNY'S NEW BOOK HERE: http://smarturl.it/unremember


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
